verses.text: So when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w old|strong="H2204"\w* and \w full|strong="H7646"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, he made \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
¶ And he gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, with the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.

Now the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* were \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w* from the \w age|strong="H1121"\w* of \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*: and their \w number|strong="H4557"\w* by their \w polls|strong="H1538"\w*, man by \w man|strong="H1397"\w*, was \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

Of \w which|strong="H0428"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add were\add* to set \w forward|strong="H5329"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add were\add* \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* and \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*:\f + \fr 23.4 \ft set…: or, oversee\f*

Moreover \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add were\add* \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*; and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* which I \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, \add said David\add*, to \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \add therewith\add*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* them into \w courses|strong="H4256"\w* among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \add namely\add*, \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, and \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.\f + \fr 23.6 \ft courses: Heb. divisions\f*
¶ Of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w* \add were\add*, \w Laadan|strong="H3936"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*.\f + \fr 23.7 \ft Laadan: or, Libni\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Laadan|strong="H3936"\w*; the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \add was\add* \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Zetham|strong="H2241"\w*, and \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*; \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w*, and \w Haziel|strong="H2381"\w*, and \w Haran|strong="H2039"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w*. These \add were\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Laadan|strong="H3936"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \add were\add*, \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w*, \w Zina|strong="H2126"\w*, and \w Jeush|strong="H3266"\w*, and \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w*. These \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*.\f + \fr 23.10 \ft Zina: or, Zizah\f*

And \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w* was the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w Zizah|strong="H2125"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*: but \w Jeush|strong="H3266"\w* and \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w* had not \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; therefore they were in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reckoning|strong="H6486"\w*, according to \add their\add* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft had…: Heb. did not multiply sons\f*

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*; \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*, \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*; \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* was \w separated|strong="H0914"\w*, that he should \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, he and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto him, and to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* in his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Now \add concerning\add* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* were \w named|strong="H7121"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.
The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \add were\add*, \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*, and \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*.
Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*, \w Shebuel|strong="H7619"\w* \add was\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 23.16 \ft Shebuel: also called, Shubael\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w* \add were\add*, \w Rehabiah|strong="H7345"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*. And \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w* had none \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; but the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rehabiah|strong="H7345"\w* were \w very|strong="H4605"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w*.\f + \fr 23.17 \ft the chief: or, the first\f*\f + \fr 23.17 \ft very many: Heb. highly multiplied\f*
Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*; \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 23.18 \ft Shelomith: also called, Shelomoth\f*

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; \w Jeriah|strong="H3404"\w* the \w first|strong="H7218"\w*, \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w Jahaziel|strong="H3166"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, and \w Jekameam|strong="H3360"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*.
Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*; \w Michah|strong="H4318"\w* the \w first|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w Jesiah|strong="H3449"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*; \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, and \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*. The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*; \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*.

And \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and had no \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, but \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* them.\f + \fr 23.22 \ft brethren: or, kinsmen\f*
The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*; \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, and \w Eder|strong="H5740"\w*, and \w Jeremoth|strong="H3406"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

¶ These \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* after the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; \add even\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, as they were \w counted|strong="H6485"\w* by \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w names|strong="H8034"\w* by their \w polls|strong="H1538"\w*, that \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, from the \w age|strong="H1121"\w* of \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*.

For \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath given \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* unto his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they may \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:\f + \fr 23.25 \ft that…: or, and he dwelleth in Jerusalem, etc\f*

And also unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*; they shall no \add more\add* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, nor any \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of it for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* thereof.

For by the \w last|strong="H0314"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add were\add* \w numbered|strong="H4557"\w* from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w above|strong="H4605"\w*:\f + \fr 23.27 \ft numbered: Heb. number\f*

Because their \w office|strong="H4612"\w* \add was\add* to \w wait|strong="H3027"\w* on the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*, and in the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, and in the \w purifying|strong="H2893"\w* of all holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, and the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*;\f + \fr 23.28 \ft their…: Heb. their station was at the hand of the sons of Aaron\f*

Both for the \w shewbread|strong="H3899"\w*, and for the fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* for meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and for the \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w cakes|strong="H7550"\w*, and for \add that which is baked in\add* the \w pan|strong="H4227"\w*, and for that which is \w fried|strong="H7246"\w*, and for all manner of \w measure|strong="H4884"\w* and \w size|strong="H4060"\w*;\f + \fr 23.29 \ft pan: or, flat plate\f*

And to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* to \w thank|strong="H3034"\w* and \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and likewise at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*;

And to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* all burnt \w sacrifices|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, in the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, and on the set \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, by \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, according to the \w order|strong="H4941"\w* commanded unto them, \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:

And that they should \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, and the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, in the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
